description: After the murder of his friend, Felix Leiter Bond hunts after the drug dealer responsible.
name: Licence to Kill

description: In this volume, our hero meets greek gods, aliens from Uranus, gives people thruout the world gifts instead of Santa claus, and has to "babysit" Seppo Ilmarinen Jr who becomes one of the most ineffective superheroes ever.
name: Läpi harmaan kiven / Thru the grey rock
Volume Two
Star Wars Infinities: Visions of the Blade

volume.name: Star Wars Infinities: Visions of the Blade

description:
Multiple stories issue:

  1. Il segreto di Juno 20
  2. Tradimento
  3. L'astronave fantasma
  4. Il volto del nemico
name: Il segreto di Juno 20

description:
Some space smugglers get their hands on a mysterious silicon cargo, and want to find the workshop that was intended to receive it. Meanwhile, the Alfa Agency comes across a chip bearing a never seen before technology. Their paths will cross on an asteroid where a new form of artificial intelligence is developing...

A single unpublished story of 316 pages.
name: Il vessillo d'acciaio

description: The robot Aldus has escaped and is again a threat. Nathan is on his trail , but instead he finds another “himself” from an alternate universe, that will take him to a journey into his own past.
name: Infiniti universi

description: After    the death of Jeremy Larson , president of Globe TV , the son Hamlet begins to suspect Claudio and Gertrud Larson , brother and wife of the deceased. Nathan Never has to   shed light on the matter and find out if it is somehow connected with some   threatening letters and a series of murders inspired by the biblical plagues , involving some prominent personalities from the entertainment world . An unusual story with Shakespearean echoes that will lead Nathan to investigate in the golden world of network television .
name: Network

description:
multiple stories issue:

  1. Un cadavere per Andy
  2. L'alveare
  3. Ritorno a casa
name: Un cadavere per Andy

description:
In this issue:

  1. Delitto e castigo
  2. La resa dei conti
  3. Vite future
name: Delitto e castigo

description:
Anita Blake walked away from her last case with more than a few bruises--but those wounds are nothing compared to the scrapes that lie ahead in this blood-soaked adaptation of Hamilton's third erotic thriller.

To find a killer targeting the undead, Anita must descend into the dangerous, supernatural demimonde operated by the master vampire Jean-Claude. It will take all of Anita's wits to survive THE CIRCUS OF THE DAMNED!

Collects Anita Blake: Circus Of The Damned: The Charmer issues #1-5.
name: The Charmer

volume.name: Anita Blake, Vampire Hunter: Circus Of The Damned

description: Since ancient days, the Gaius School of Witchcraft and Wizardry has trained the fiercest swordsmen and the most powerful wizards. Now one boy could become the greatest of them all. If he studies hard. If he is true to his friends. If he believes. And if he survives...
name: Never Stop Believing
Momento Mori; Riot Grrl; Luther; I, Zombie: Remains of the Day; Deader Meat; Bakemono and the Cranes

description: Samantha's graduating from high school in the Valley - getting together with her pals to throw an End of the World party to celebrate, everyone ends up accidentally locked in a bomb shelter. When Samantha and her pals emerge, they find that the entire world has changed.
name: Part 1

description: A story dealing with Captain America, Iron Man, and a chronological look at the AAFES Exchange and its contribution to America's armed forces.
name: History of the Exchange

volume.name: New Avengers: American Armed Forces Exclusive Special

name: Vol. 2

description: Meet Ryan Choi - the young hotshot professor filling the empty slot on Ivy University's teaching staff…and who inadvertently fills the role as the all-new super-heroic Atom!
name: My Life In Miniature

volume.name: The All New Atom: My Life In Miniature

description: Life at the Gaius School of Witchcraft and Wizardry is never dull–and often it’s dangerous. Chris Cottenburg, a High Elf, was a student of magic until calamity struck. Now his life-giving crystal has gone missing, and Professor Arshes must undertake a perilous journey to save his student–a journey deep into the shadows of Chris’s soul!
name: Never Give Up

description: In this volume collecting issues #12-16 of the acclaimed series, the new Atom searches the multiverse for Ray Palmer, missing since the events of Identity Crisis.
name: The Hunt For Ray Palmer

volume.name: The All New Atom: The Hunt For Ray Palmer

description: The mini-series that leads to the X-Event of 2011 continues! This month we get inside the heads of the two most important X-Men: Cyclops and Wolverine. See parts of their past you never saw before, experience the most intense moments in X-History and understand what leads to the Schism that is coming!
name: Part 4

description:
When a librarian receives a love letter hidden in one of her books, she finds a very unlikely reading partner.

The meanest boy at school sends a letter that falls into the wrong hands, compelling him to reveal a side of himself that no one ever expected.

A mistreated young girl finds hope in a friend, and the strength to leave her troubled past behind.

There’s a single love letter–and its author could be any one of a number of boys. Now the search is on to discover the tender wordsmith’s identity.

When a mailman befriends a blind woman who recently lost her companion, he tries to heal her loneliness through love letters.

George Asakura leads us through five stories with humor, wit, and enough mystery to keep us guessing with each new delivery. You’ve got mail!
name: Five Letters...Five Chances at Love

volume.name: A Perfect Day For Love Letters

description:
When Araki finds an old fax machine, he starts corresponding with the only girl who can receive his letters. But there’s a twist!

A brother’s dying request: deliver a videotape to his girlfriend...someone his sibling didn’t even know existed. And there will be other secrets.

Natsume must attend summer school while her close friend takes an exotic vacation. Oh well, best take his advice and “let the wind blow through you!”

With a move to Alaska imminent, a girl vows to win the heart of her secret crush. Will a swimming pool rendezvous dampen her message?

Plus Bonus stories! Love is in the air...and in the water...and in the mail with these intriguing tales of affection, rejection, miscommunication, and sweet connection!
name: Six Tales of Love

volume.name: A Perfect Day For Love Letters

description: The story takes place in four different eras. A hundred years after the time of Nathan, the world has been destroyed by a war between humans and Technodroids, half organic and half machine beings. Close to defeat, the technodroids send two agents in the past (at the time of Nathan) to change the course of future events. But, in the complex temporal game, also an enigmatic character who comes from a future far more remote than that of the technodroids, is determined to play his part.
name: Doppio futuro

description:
The story opens in ancient Japan, where a dramatic clash takes place between the imperial forces and terrible monsters, the demons.

"Meanwhile," the quiet life in the future of Susan Strong, is upset by the war with technodroids, that are attacking the Earth from space. Only a hero is leading the Earth resistance: his name is Nemo and fate has set up an appointment between him and Susan.
name: Odissea nel futuro

description: Third chapter of the "Double Future Saga", set back and forth in time. The temporal anomaly is creating always new paradoxes, condemning humanity to covers always the same story: the free will of humanity seems at risk and it will probably be erased. Nathan has a special role in the events, and maybe he can do something…
name: Un nuovo futuro

description: Kokuyo and Harika are a little unusual–and not just because they’re sorcery students. They’re Obsidians, wizards who must use enchanted swords to help them cast spells. Their fellow students think Obsidians are inferior to “normal” wizards. But Kokuyo and Harika have something that their cohorts don’t: the power of friendship!
name: Magical Friends

description:
In this volume:

-Matt the ghost finds a surprising gal to love. A witch.

-Väinämöinen and Jabe visit a troll-seminar.

-Väinämöinen and Untamo the hedgehog visit a zoo.

-Seppo Ilmarinen Jr. creates a clone of Väinämöinen. Uh oh...

-Väinämöinen spends some time with a kid called Odie (not from Garfield obviously).

Also has Santa Claus in a few strips, and Darth Sidious in one panel!
name: Se koira älähtää... / That dog shrieks...

description:
Adventures of Finlands greatest mythological hero in the 21st century continue. 
 
In the red shirt of the smiling man reads "HEALTHY LIFE".
name: Vaaksa vaaraan/A length to danger

description:
Contains the following stories (in Italian): 
 

Ka-Zar - Back to the Savage Land from: Astonishing Tales # 3 - 12/1970
Ka-Zar - The Sun-God from: Astonishing Tales # 4 - 02/1971
Ka-Zar – Rampage from: Astonishing Tales # 5 - 04/1971
Ka-Zar - 'Ware the Winds of Death from: Astonishing Tales # 6 - 06/1971
Lorna - Tom-Toms of Danger from: Lorna the Jungle Girl # 14 - 07/1955
name: Ka-Zar: Il Vento della Morte

description:
Contains the following stories (in Italian): 
 

Ka-Zar – Deluge from: Astonishing Tales # 7 - 08/1971

Ka-Zar - The of New Britannia from: Astonishing Tales, 8 - 10/1971

Ka-Zar - The End in Flame from: Astonishing Tales, 10 - 02/1972

Jann - Jungle Fever from: Jungle Tales, 2 - 11/1954
name: Ka-Zar: La Battaglia della Nuova Britannia
Odio!
Lo spettro del passato
Satko!
La historia de Mortadelo y Filemón
Un... Dos... Tres... Chapuza otra vez!
Las chispeantes aventuras de El botones Sacarino
